price: 63.Digaalâ maxco elle nummatteeh digaalá cakkisite mari ni-Rabbow ama maray makkosne ninnih kah makkotne innah ken makkosneh, nanu ken awliinuu kee ken cat ok koo eleelitneeh bari keenik nakke, usun nee aqbudak masuginnon sinni nafsî fayxii kee sheetoona aqbudak sugeenî kal iyyen.
arabic: قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ حَقَّ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ رَبَّنَا هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ ٱلَّذِينَ أَغۡوَيۡنَآ أَغۡوَيۡنَٰهُمۡ كَمَا غَوَيۡنَاۖ تَبَرَّأۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَۖ مَا كَانُوٓاْ إِيَّانَا يَعۡبُدُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla alladhīna ḥaqqa ʿalayhimu al-qawlu rabbanā hāulāi alladhīna aghwaynā aghwaynāhum kamā ghawaynā tabarranā ilayka mā kānū iyyānā yaʿbudūna
